course_description: We often say we "have" a mind or body, which raises questions. Are they separate? How do they interact? And who are "we" if we possess them? This course concerns the nature of the mind, consciousness, and the body, as well relationships among the mental, the physiological, and the world.
prerequisites: Two PHIL courses or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1679, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Wahman, Status: Open
